scripts.remove-add-all: yarn remove-add-1 && yarn remove-add-2 && yarn remove-add-3 && yarn remove-add-4 && yarn remove-add-5 && yarn remove-add-6 && yarn remove-add-7 && yarn remove-add-8
scripts.remove-add-1: cross-env-shell && cd 1-start && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd .. && cd 1-end && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
scripts.remove-add-2: cross-env-shell && cd 2-start && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd .. && cd 2-end && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
scripts.remove-add-3: cross-env-shell && cd 3-start && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd .. && cd 3-end && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
scripts.remove-add-4: cross-env-shell && cd 4-start && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd .. && cd 4-end && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
scripts.remove-add-5: cross-env-shell && cd 5-start && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd .. && cd 5-end && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
scripts.remove-add-6: cross-env-shell && cd 6-start && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd .. && cd 6-end && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
scripts.remove-add-7: cross-env-shell && cd 7-start && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd .. && cd 7-end && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
scripts.remove-add-8: cross-env-shell && cd 8-start && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd .. && cd 8-end && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
scripts.remove-add-boilerplate: cross-env-shell && cd boilerplate && yarn remove $PACKAGE && yarn add $PACKAGE$VERSION && cd ..
